lines.text: Daddy, I've got a surprise for you. I got a new fur coat yesterday. Oh, you'll love it. It's a dream!
How much did the dream cost?
Mister, never interfere between a guy and his dame. If he don't sock you, she will.
You going to marry my daughter?
You're a sucker. If you have any money, you'll be broke in a month. Where you gonna live? In a bird sanctuary?
